mapper.select: SELECT count(TAG) AS count, SYS_DICT.CODE AS code, SYS_DICT.NAME AS tag FROM T_ARTICLE LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT ON tag = SYS_DICT.CODE WHERE T_ARTICLE.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY SYS_DICT.NAME, SYS_DICT.CODE

SELECT ARTICLE.ID, ARTICLE.TITLE, ARTICLE.CONTENT, ARTICLE.UPDATE_TIME, ARTICLE.CREATE_TIME, ARTICLE.ORDER_NUM, DICT.CODE AS TAG, ifnull(T_VIEWS.COUNT, 0) as VIEW_COUNT FROM T_ARTICLE ARTICLE LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT DICT ON ARTICLE.TAG = DICT.CODE LEFT JOIN T_VIEWS ON ARTICLE.id = T_VIEWS.ARTICLE_ID WHERE ARTICLE.IS_DELETE = 0 AND ARTICLE.ID = #{id}
